activities: Infocore acts as a database (list) broker. We arrange data transactions between data providers and end-users.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer and B2B data in all forms
privacyprograms: U.S. Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Via the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) for HR data, and the DMA Safe Harbor Program for all other data.
